rows.label: qst106101_msg0001
rows.name:
Do you know a shop
called Llysiau Greens?

rows.label: qst106101_msg0002
rows.name:
The girl there, Tena, is
bright and generous, but she
lost her father last month.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0003
rows.name:
Her mother passed away from an illness long
ago, and she and her father ran the shop
together. Now she must be feeling very lonely.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0004
rows.name:
She has the skill to create new products,
but she's still too inexperienced to run the
shop alone. She must be full of anxiety.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0005
rows.name:
That's where you come in. I
want you to save that shop.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0006
rows.name:
First, please buy one of
each of their products.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0007
rows.name:
If you do that, Tena
will recognize you.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0008
rows.name:
And she'll be willing to sell you
the deeds to Llysiau Greens.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0009
rows.name:
If you buy them, you'll become
the owner of that shop.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0010
rows.name:
It doesn't mean you'll get
a share of the profits, but
the benefits are great.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0011
rows.name:
With you as a backer, Tena will
be able to run the shop she
inherited with confidence...

rows.label: qst106101_msg0012
rows.name:
and you'll receive special benefits too.
For example, it might become easier to pick
up items, or you might become faster.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0013
rows.name: What do you say? Feel like helping out?

rows.label: qst106101_msg0014
rows.name: That's what I like to hear.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0015
rows.name:
Like I said, first, buy one of
everything at Tena's shop.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0016
rows.name:
Including the new Puri Leaf
Salad. I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0101
rows.name:
First, please buy one of each
product at Llysiau Greens.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0102
rows.name:
The Crispy Saut√© and the
Torigo-Style Veggie Marinade.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0103
rows.name:
And the Stuffed Meaty Carrot
and the new Puri Leaf Salad.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0105
rows.name: You only need to buy one of each.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0201
rows.name:
You should be able to buy
the Llysiau Shop Deeds at
Llysiau Greens now, right?

rows.label: qst106101_msg0202
rows.name:
It's a bit pricey, but next
I'd like you to buy that.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0203
rows.name: I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0301
rows.name: Thank you.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0302
rows.name:
It's been a while since I've
seen Tena smile like that.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0303
rows.name:
She's bright and generous,
but she's also stubborn.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0304
rows.name:
She's my childhood friend, but
she won't accept my help.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0305
rows.name:
But how can I not worry? I wanted
to help her, even just a little.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0306
rows.name:
Thanks to you, Tena will be able
to run the shop she inherited from
her parents with confidence.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0308
rows.name:
Oh, and it's not just Tena's shop.
It's the same with other shops too.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0309
rows.name:
If you buy one of each
type of product, you'll
be able to buy the deeds.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0310
rows.name:
If you buy them, there are
great benefits, and they
differ from shop to shop.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0311
rows.name: But there's one thing to be careful of.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0312
rows.name:
Unlike Tena's shop, few shops
have all their products
available from the start.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0313
rows.name:
You have to raise the development level
to make all the products available,
otherwise they won't sell you the deeds.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0314
rows.name:
Well, if you're having trouble
getting them to sell you the deeds,
it's best to come back later.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0315
rows.name:
Oops, I've been talking for a while.
That's enough of my meddling.

rows.label: qst106101_msg0316
rows.name:
I'll give you a reward.
Thank you so much.
